ai_page.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Plymouth - Page
ai_page.body:
Planning and building control

  • Planning applications
    Apply for planning permission, find and comment on existing planning applications, report alleged unauthorised development, information on applications and fees
  • Building control
    Apply for building regulations approval, book a site inspection, report dangerous structures, information on building control applications, fees and charges
  • Planning policy and guidance
    Includes the Plymouth and South West Devon Joint Local Plan, policy documents, design guidance, monitoring and delivery and planning policy archives
  • Neighbourhood planning
    Information on the different initiatives available to local communities to improve their area, including neighbourhood forums and plans and the City Change Fund
  • Community Infrastructure Levy
    Information on the Community Infrastructure Levy (CIL), including liability, rates, deductions, reliefs, exemptions and the Annual Infrastructure Funding Statement
  • Design, conservation and heritage
    Includes information on urban design, the High Street Heritage Action Zone, listed buildings, conservation areas, ancient monuments, historic parks and archaeology
  • Trees and hedges
    Apply to work on a protected tree, view the weekly list of tree applications, report a problem with a tree and view information about how we look after trees and hedges
  • The Plymouth Plan
    Read our ground-breaking plan which looks ahead to 2034, view our progress in the annual report or use the interactive plan to view the different elements of the plan
  • Our planning awards
    View the planning awards and achievements we have won for work that we have either led on or where our teams have made a positive contribution to other organisations
  • Planning consultations
    Take part in our planning consultations and give us your thoughts, opinions and comments to have your say and influence decisions before we agree them
  • Response to the Planning Reforms
    View our formal responses to the Government’s proposals to streamline and modernise the planning process.
  • Plymouth Regeneration Forum
    View the minutes of the Plymouth Regeneration Forum which includes membership from key investors, landowners and other development stakeholders in the city
  • Planning films and videos
    View some of the films and videos we have created for housing, transport, nature and the environment, Plymouth Energy Community and the City Change Fund

ai_improvement.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Plymouth - Improvement

text_issues.Issue: The page mainly provides information about planning and building control, not about applying for permission to make flat improvements like installing a new kitchen or adding a handrail.
text_issues.original:
Planning applications


  
    Apply for planning permission, find and comment on existing planning applications, report alleged unauthorised development, information on applications and fees
text_issues.improvement: Apply for permission to make flat improvements, find the application forms, and learn about the process and associated fees.
text_issues.why: This version directly addresses the specific need for flat improvement permissions, making it clearer what the page offers for that purpose.

text_issues.Issue: It would be clearer if there was a specific section or link dedicated to applying for permission to make small flat improvements, with details on the process, forms, and timelines.
text_issues.original:
Planning applications


  
    Apply for planning permission, find and comment on existing planning applications, report alleged unauthorised development, information on applications and fees
text_issues.improvement: Visit our dedicated section on flat improvement permissions to find all necessary forms, guidelines, and estimated decision times.
text_issues.why: Providing a specific section or link simplifies navigation and ensures users can easily find relevant information about flat improvement requests.

text_issues.Issue: Adding a step-by-step guide or a clear link to the relevant online form for flat upgrade permissions would make it much easier for me to find and understand how to proceed.
text_issues.original:
Planning applications


  
    Apply for planning permission, find and comment on existing planning applications, report alleged unauthorised development, information on applications and fees
text_issues.improvement: Use our step-by-step online guide and access the specific form to request permission for flat upgrades like kitchens or handrails.
text_issues.why: A clear guide and direct link reduce confusion, streamline the application process, and respond directly to the feedback about ease of understanding.
